amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Shipbuilding and Conversion, Navy, $20,000,000 for DDG-51 modernization planning.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1293 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1293 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S9562-9563; text: CR S9563) To make available from amounts available for Shipbuilding and Conversion, Navy, $20,000,000 for DDG-51 modernization planning.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1293 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1293 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins.
